'''''Modern Fantasy: Five Studies''''' is a 1975 study of works of fantasy, including essays on authors such as [[J.R.R. Tolkien]], [[C.S. Lewis]], [[George MacDonald]], and [[Wikipedia:Mervyn Peake|Mervyn Peake]]. The author quotes from [[Letter to C.N. Manlove|a letter]] from Tolkien discussing ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' (p. 158).<ref name=TB>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=http://www.tolkienbooks.net/php/details.php?reference=61425|articlename=Modern Fantasy: Five Studies. 1975|dated=|website=TB|accessed=22 January 2012}}</ref>
